text: Alright, so I'm driving to the mountain today and I just had this wild realization about pattern theory.
What if we could compress all human knowledge into mathematical formulas? Like instead of storing books, we store the PATTERNS that generate books.
This rolling studio setup is perfect because I can capture these insights while driving instead of losing them.
The genius is that one drive becomes 20 pieces of content. The 360 camera captures everything, AI extracts the best angles, and it posts automatically.
I think we could turn the school bus into a mobile workshop. Charge $5-10K for weekend builder retreats.
